name: order_sequence_uml
title: Order Processing Sequence Diagram
description: UML sequence diagram showing the message flow between User, Web UI, API Gateway, Order Service, Inventory, Payment, and Notification services during order processing with numbered sync/async messages
python_code:
from diagrams import Diagram, Cluster, Edge
from diagrams.onprem.client import Users, Client
from diagrams.generic.compute import Rack
from diagrams.generic.blank import Blank

graph_attr = {
    "fontsize": "24",
    "bgcolor": "white",
    "pad": "0.6",
    "splines": "ortho",
    "nodesep": "0.7",
    "ranksep": "0.9",
}

with Diagram(
    "Order Processing Sequence Diagram",
    filename="OUTPUT_PATH",
    outformat="png",
    show=False,
    direction="TB",
    graph_attr=graph_attr
):
    # Actors/Components
    with Cluster("Actors", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#e3f2fd"}):
        user = Users("User")
        web_ui = Client("Web UI")
    
    with Cluster("Services", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#e8f5e9"}):
        api_gateway = Rack("API Gateway")
        order_service = Rack("Order Service")
        inventory = Rack("Inventory
Service")
        payment = Rack("Payment
Service")
        notification = Rack("Notification
Service")
    
    # Lifelines (vertical representation)
    blank1 = Blank("")
    blank2 = Blank("")
    blank3 = Blank("")
    blank4 = Blank("")
    blank5 = Blank("")
    
    # Message Flow
    user >> Edge(label="1. Place Order", color="blue", style="bold") >> web_ui
    web_ui >> Edge(label="2. POST /orders", color="blue", style="bold") >> api_gateway
    api_gateway >> Edge(label="3. Create Order", color="blue", style="bold") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="4. Check Stock", color="blue", style="bold") >> inventory
    inventory >> Edge(label="5. Stock Available", color="green", style="dashed") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="6. Reserve Stock", color="blue", style="bold") >> inventory
    inventory >> Edge(label="7. Stock Reserved", color="green", style="dashed") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="8. Process Payment", color="blue", style="bold") >> payment
    payment >> Edge(label="9. Payment Success", color="green", style="dashed") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="10. Send Notification", color="orange", style="dashed") >> notification
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="11. Order Created", color="green", style="dashed") >> api_gateway
    api_gateway >> Edge(label="12. 201 Created", color="green", style="dashed") >> web_ui
    web_ui >> Edge(label="13. Order Confirmed", color="green", style="dashed") >> user
    
    notification >> Edge(label="14. Email Sent
(Async)", color="orange", style="dotted") >> blank1
